headline: Wabtec to acquire Sweden’s Dellner Couplers for $960M
summary: Wabtec says it is acquiring Dellner Couplers, a Swedish manufacturer of passenger couplers and equipment, in a $960 million deal. The post Wabtec to acquire Sweden’s Dellner Couplers for $960M appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: EQT to sell Dellner Couplers to Wabtec
summary: EQT is pleased to announce that the EQT VIII fund ("EQT") has signed a definitive agreement to sell Dellner Couplers ("Dellner" or "the Company"), a leading provider of train connection systems for passenger rail, to Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB). The transaction values Dellner at approximately EUR 890 million.

raw.headline: EQT to sell Dellner Couplers to Wabtec
raw.summary: EQT is pleased to announce that the EQT VIII fund ("EQT") has signed a definitive agreement to sell Dellner Couplers ("Dellner" or "the Company"), a leading provider of train connection systems for passenger rail, to Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB). The transaction values Dellner at approximately EUR 890 million.

headline: Wabtec to Acquire Dellner Couplers
summary: PITTSBURGH, March 18, 2025--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced today a definitive agreement to acquire Dellner Couplers, a global leader in highly engineered safety-critical train connection systems and services for passenger rail rolling stock. The acquisition brings highly attractive and complementary technologies to Wabtec and positions the Company for accelerated, profitable growth, while strengthening its portfolio of mission critical passenger rail systems.
